name: iPhone 5 Leather Case
description:
This functional, hand stitched, leather iPhone 5 case is not only totally cool.  It is also functional.  The outside pocket will hold 1-5 cards and the interior of the phone pocket is conditioned to not scratch your screen.  



Ph-case-2013

name: 1/2" Cross Bracelet
description:
This 1/2" cross bracelet features a hammered pewter cross in silver, gold or copper and a two snap closure for size adjustment.






Item 2013-1.5CROSS

name: Cross Body Satchel
description:
This Leather Cross Body Bag is 100% hand sewn using Mustang Leather.  The center will hold an iPad, the front pocket will hold an iPad Mini or Kindle Fire.  The back has a pouch pocket.   This bag has a snap closure front & back and swivel hooks.  

Bag 6-4-2013

name: Messenger Bag
description:
Handmade Leather Messanger Bag
This 100% hand sewn, mustang leather messanger bag features an adjustable strap, interior synch strap, can fit your laptop, has a seperate iPad or tablet pouch, has four thumb drive slots, will hold a mouse or cellphone has a small interior pocket and a large external pocket.  This messanger bag closes with a masculine buckle and has swivel hooks.  Great over the shoulder and long enough for a cross body fit.

Bag-6-11-2013

name: Buckley Men's Watch
description: Sporty yet handsome mens watch. Featuring a masculine buckle on saddleback brown leather on a handmade watch band.

name: The Rugged Mustang - Men's Watch
description:
2" wide brown dyed handmade mustang leather cuff watch band & distressed watch. Please allow a variance on each of these pieces are one of a kind and may be made from some recycled pieces.  This watch has a beefy burnished gold buckle and other mixed hardware.  The watch face may vary.  

Watch-5-2013-99

name: Triple Wrap Bacelet
description:
This triple wrap Bacelet is 25" x 1/2" and has a three snap closure.  It is fun and elegant with detailed wire wrapping.  It features 10 stones with some being natural gemstones. No two are alike so there is a little element of excitement when you open your order.  Available in an assortment of finishes each bracelet is handmade and hand dyed.

Item Number- TR-Wrap-25-2012

name: Hammered cross bracelet
description:
This fun 1.25" x 8.5" split leather cuff features a hammered cross and cool silver wire embellishment. It has a two snap closure and is thin enough to wear with other bracelets. The cross is hammer into shape for comfort fit.  

Item number 2012-Hammered-cross

name: Wrap Bracelet
description:
All handcrafted, this bracelet is gorgeous 1/2" wide by 25" long. It wraps around three times with a three snap closure. It features 8 stones and unique wire work.  You can get this in sold or distressed leather finishes. The wire corollaries with the leather finishes.  No two pieces are alike and this item is created for each order.  The pictures reflect the leather finishes and are representative of the piece.  Also pitting, scaring or fading of the finish is deliberate to preserve the uniqueness of the leather.
Item number 2012-WR-25

name: Blooms Flower Cuff
description:
2" x 8.5" leather cuff in a rich hand dyed, stained or panted finishes and a two snap closure for adjustable sizing. it features a handmade leather split flower.  



Item number 2012-S-Flower

options.name: Brown cuff w/earth tone & turquoise flower
Turquoise cuff w/ TURQ, Pink & brown flower
Pink cuff w/ brown, TURQ, pink flower
Brown cuff w/ assorted earth tone flwer

name: IPad 2 Cover
description:
Handmade Leather IPad 2 Cover.  Featuring Dark Brown Finish and a Wrap and Tie  closure and handmade clay button.  This cover gives a rugged yet elegant cover.  
Each item is unique to preserve the character.

Item Number: IP2-2011

name: The Explorer
description:
This masculine hand dyed, stained and tanned raw cowhide leather journal is a must for every serious Journalist.  Filled with 150 acid-free page of artist quality white paper with a slightly stiffer body and a small tooth surface is  excellent for all mediums. This Journal allows the artist to paint, draw, use charcoals, ink and quill, pastels and of course a simple gel pen.  The sky's the limit with this Writer's Wonder.  As with most of our Journals, the button wrap & tie closure with your choice of embellishments is available.  Approximately 6" x 9" x 2"
Each Journal is unique to preserve the character, therefore this is a sample of the actual product.
* Suitable for all mediums.


R-692-ART-002

name: The Traveler
description:
This rugged Raw Cowhide has been dyed using a mixture of products and stains then blended with a vegetable blend.  It is approximately 6" x 9" x 2" and features a primitive wrap and tie closure, button, beading, metal cross or other adornment.  The wrap is a leather strap or rugged jute cording. (Specify below)  It has 150 distressed pages of writing paper, stained and cooked to create a time worn elegance. This Journal is bound with a long cross stitch. * This journal is excellent for dry mediums and is a dream to write in.  The color shown is Cognac.   No two are alike to preserve the character, therefore this is a sample of the actual product. 


RT-69150-001

name: Reflections
description:
You can not go wrong with this Tooled or Italian soft bound, 6"x9"x2", Leather Writer's Journal.  This Journal features a unique button, wrap and tie closure, adorned with beading or metal charms.  It has 150 pages of hand treated, dyed or stained, cooked papers.  Never knowing when you will be enumerated with the slightest aroma of blended coffee, tea, wine or many other fruit blends, opening this Journal each day will bring the inspiration to write of one's adventures.  To keep an element of surprise this Journal is personally selected by our Artist, Regina McCormick.  Never fret, for you are guaranteed to fall in love with this most treasured Journal.   
* Suitable for dry Mediums.
Each Journal is unique to preserve the character, therefore this is a sample of the actual product.


ARTS-69150-001

name: Days Gone By
description:
This Handmade Italian, Tooled or Exotic  Leather, 6" x 9" Journal has 150 acid-free pages of cream colored smooth writing paper, featuring a soft cover with the wrap & tie closure, decorative beading or metal charm, a unique button and ancient long cross stitch binding technique.   The wrap is with a rough jute cording. * Suitable for dry mediums.
Each Journal is unique to preserve character and is signed and dated.  This Journal is available in an assortment of colors and unless a color is specified one will be selected for you.


SP-69150-001

name: Memories
description:
The hand dyed, stained, and tanned rugged Leather hide makes this mid sized Journal the desire of every artistic soul.  It is graced with 150 acid-free small tooth paper that has been hand cut to size.  *Suitable for all mediums.  Approximately 6" x 5" x 2-1/2"  featuring the wrap and tie button closure, jute cording, beading, cross or metal tags.  This Journal has a more tailored feel yet maintains the natural elements of the Leather.  It is available in a variety of colors. 
Each Journal is unique to preserve it's character, therefore this is an example of the actual product.


R-652/5-ART-001

name: Tailored for Travel
description:
This mid sized Journal is a travelers dream.  At approximately 
5" x 6" x 2",  this soft bound Journal can be covered in Italian or Tooled Leather (specify below).  It features a unique button, wrap and tie closure, beading, cross or metal charms.  With 150 pages of acid-free artist paper, what sets this treasure apart is the ability to use any medium.  Perfect for writing, drawing, charcoals, oil and or watercolor, this paper has hand cut smooth edges and the surface has a slight texture appealing to the artist in you.  (Always refer to your expertise in preparing your papers for oils to preserve the life span of your work)
* Suitable for wet/dry mediums.
No two are alike preserving the character, therefore this is a sample of the actual product.

S-56150ART-001

name: Whistling Breeze
description:
This Raw Cowhide Leather Journal goes through multiple steps to achieve the Turquoise color featuring a Brown Rough Strap and a snap closure.  It has 150 pages of writing paper and is approximately 6" x 5" x 1-3/4".  * Suitable for dry mediems.
Each Journal is unique to preserve the character, therefore the picture shown is a sample of the actual product. 


RP-65150-A001

name: The Westerner
description:
This Journal is just a dream, soft and full of 150 pages of distressed, hand torn, air dried brown paper, enhancing the illusion of a book that has been around through the ages. Stitched with a blocked long cross stitching, giving the spine a little hit of the old west.  Featuring a hammered button wrap and tie closure with tightly bound rope and is finished with a small cross and ceramic bead.  The size of this Journal is approximately 5" x 5" x 2".   It fits perfectly in a backpack or purse and is small with grand presence.
* Suitable for dry mediums only.
This is a picture of the actual Journal and one of a kind.

TBR-552-ART-001

name: The Doddler
description:
These Journals are excellent gifts, great for the beginning Journalist or great for the backpack & purse.  Covered in soft or tooled leathers with 150 acid-free pages of writing paper.  Approximately 5" x 6" x1-1/2" featuring assorted button wrap and tie closure and misc. bead, cross or metal charm.  Bound with the same ancient binding techniques as the more esteemed Journals, these little gems can hold their own among even the most seasoned Journalist.  With the option to select colors an element of personalization is available.  However, to bee cost effective the embellishments will be preselected.  
* Suitable for dry mediums only
Each Journal is unique to preserve the character, therefore this is a sample of the actual product.

SP-561/2-001

name: The Book of Prayers
description:
These precious little journals were inspired by a story my Father told me as a child.  He shared with me that in ancient times people told stories and didn't have books.  These oracles were preserved until a time when God gave men direction to write the Laws of God on small pieces of parchment and tie them to their foreheads and hang them over their hearts.  Thus the Book of Prayers or as some might say Book of Secrets was birthed in my heart.  Handcrafted just like the larger journals and filled with hand torn paper, these 1 1/2" x 2" journals are fully functional.  Although most enjoy them as a place to note very special notes or the subject of  interesting conversation.

J-Neck-001

name: Journal Key Chains
description:
These miniature masterpieces are handcrafted utilizing every possible remnant of paper and leather.  They are tediously sewn giving specific attention to the64 page, hand torn handmade Elephant Dung Paper imported from Sri Lanka.  The over all dimensions for this tiny treasure are 1-3/4" x1-1/2" x1" and it features the wrap and tie closure with misc. adornments.  
* Dry mediums only.
** As each of the miniature Journals are created to eliminate waste, the color of the leathers can not be selected by the customer.  The adornments may be selected to enhance the customized experience.
Each key chain is unique to preserve the character and each item is shown and sold as it is ordered unless misc. is specified below in which one will one selected for you.

JKEY-MINI-001

name: Chic-a-dee's Choice 3"
description:
This ultra soft hand dyed and conditioned leather bracelet is a leather lovers dream.  The width is approximately 3" wide and 8.5" long with a two snap closure.  It has been worked and worn for an  ultimate comfortable wearing experience.  The stones are matched to allow versatility in your wardrobe yet still ensuring the richness of that unique piece of jewelery.  No two are alike and frayed edges or pits in the leather are deliberate to enhance the distressed appeal.  This item is made to order.  (Pictures are for reference and color of leather only.  The width of the leather is the reason for price adjustment. )

description:

name: A little extra
description:
These split leather cuff's are adorned with a little bling taking your arm candy to the next level.  Available in an assortment of colors and no two are alike to preserve a uniqueness for our valued clients.  


SAC-BL-2.0-001

name: 2" Split's Arm Candy
description:
These Handmade 2" wide x 8 1/2" Leather Split Cuff Bracelets with 
snap closure are all the rave in arm candy.  Each cuff is unique and will have some element of variance in color creating it's own personality.  This will be predominate in the distressed pieces.
Black is a solid color.
Chocolate is a solid color.
Tempting Turquoise is an opaque color with a washed look.
Indigo is a Blue and Black Distressed finish and varies.
Gold Shimmer is a solid and will wear and/or crackle with time.
Radical Red is an opaque washed color.
Bungalow Brown is a Distressed Brown and varies .
Worn Out is a Black Heavily Distressed Finish with a lot of variance.
Burnished is Bungalow Brown with slight shimmers of Gold.

SAC-PL-2.0-002
